expense of the future? Perhaps more comfortably, less dangerously, but at the same
time in a meaner style, more basely?—So that precisely morality would be to blame
if the highest power and splendor actually possible to the type man was never in
fact attained? So that precisely morality was the danger of dangers?3
APPEALS TO AUTHORITY
